summary: Project involves deploying an Internet Computer (icp0.io) canister and providing a shareable draft/live URL; current deployments produce an unresolvable/missing canister ID URL.
architectural_notes: Deployment should be able to force creation of a fresh canister ID (not reuse a dead/invalid ID) and return a valid *.icp0.io canister URL.
known_issues: Deployed URL returns “Canister ID Not Resolved” / appears to lack a valid canister ID, preventing sharing a working draft link.

existing_features.title: Create a brand-new Internet Computer canister (do not reuse the existing/invalid canister ID) and redeploy the full app so the resulting public URL resolves successfully (no ICP gateway “Canister ID Not Resolved” / Error 400) and can be shared as a working draft link.

Fix frontend backend-canister-ID resolution so it reliably reads the deployed backend canister ID from env.json and/or Vite environment variables without TypeScript/runtime errors, ensuring the deployed frontend always points at the newly created backend canister.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a brand-new IC canister and redeploy to generate a working shareable draft URL

projectName: Create a brand-new IC canister and redeploy to fix “Canister ID Not Resolved”
